mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TalReview (talReviewNO, talConnNO, memNO, title, content, writeDate) VALUES ('TE_A' || LPAD(TalReview_seq.nextval, 5, 0), #{talConnNO}, #{memNO}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT talReviewNO, title, content, writeDate FROM TalReview ORDER BY talReviewNO DESC
mapper.update: update TalReview set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where talReviewNO=#{talReviewNO}
mapper.select:
select talReviewNO, r.nickname, w.content, w.title , writeDate, w.talConnNO, w.memNO from talReview w, member r where r.memNO = w.memNO
order by talReviewNO desc

SELECT TEC.TALCONNNO, TB.TALDOCNO, DT.TALDIVDF, DT.name FROM NP_TalHave TH, TalentBoard TB, TalExcConn TEC, MEMBER M, DF_TALDIV DT WHERE M.MEMNO = TB.MEMNO AND TH.TALDOCNO = TB.TALDOCNO AND TEC.TALDOCNO = TB.TALDOCNO --연결된것중 작성 AND TEC.TALCONNNO = #{talConnNO} AND TEC.memNO = #{connMemNO} --내가 신청자 AND DT.talDivDF = TH.talDivDF AND TEC.STATE = 3 UNION SELECT TEC.TALCONNNO, TB.TALDOCNO, DT.TALDIVDF, DT.name FROM NP_TalHaveCn THC, TalentBoard TB, TalExcConn TEC, MEMBER M, DF_TALDIV DT WHERE M.MEMNO = TEC.MEMNO AND THC.TALCONNNO = TEC.TALCONNNO AND TB.TALDOCNO = TEC.TALDOCNO AND TEC.TALCONNNO = #{talConnNO} AND TB.memNO = #{connMemNO} --내가 작성자 AND DT.talDivDF = THC.talDivDF AND TEC.STATE = 3 ORDER BY TALCONNNO DESC
